current.tab_1_text: Product tabs can be either universal or customized on a per product basis. You can also embed any imagery and videos here also.
current.tab_2_text:
Please allow 10 days for your order to arrive. We source products from all over the world to bring you epic offers and the lowest prices. This means sometimes you have to wait a little longer to get your order but it's always worth it!

Returns are easy, simply contact us for a returns number and send your item to our returns centre for fast processing. We'll get you a replacement or refund in a snap!
current.tab_3_text:
Here are 5 more great reasons to buy from us:

   

We Put Our Customers First to us. If it doesn't fit, it breaks, you've changed your mind or for no reason whatsoever simply send it back to us and we'll cheerfully refund you every cent.

Returns are easy, simply contact us for a returns number and send your item to our returns centre for fast processing. We'll get you a replacement or refund in a snap!

In the unlikely event that you find your item cheaper at another online store, just let us know and we'll beat the competitor's pricing hands-down.

We insist that you love everything you buy from us. If you're unhappy for any reason whatsoever, just let us know and we'll bend over backwards to make things right again.
Ordering from Shoptimized is 100% safe and secure so you can rest easy. Your personal details are never shared, sold or rented to anyone either.

settings.promotion_more_text: Take a selfie with our product and email it to happytohelp@yourdomain.com to win!

settings.text_question1: How can I place an order on your website?
settings.text_answer1: Placing an order on our website is quick and easy. Simply browse our products, select the items you wish to purchase, and add them to your cart. Proceed to the checkout page, fill in your shipping information, choose your preferred payment method, and confirm your order. Once the order is successfully placed, you will receive a confirmation email.
settings.text_question2: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.text_answer2: We accept various payment methods to provide you with convenience and flexibility. Currently, we accept major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay.
settings.text_question3: Do you offer payment in installments?
settings.text_answer3: Yes, we offer payment in installments through our partnership with Shop Pay. At the checkout, you have the option to select Shop Pay. This allows you to split your purchase into multiple smaller payments, making it more manageable and convenient for you. Simply choose this option during the checkout process, and you will be guided through the steps to set up your installment plan. Please note that eligibility for installment payments is subject to approval by Shop Pay, and additional terms and conditions may apply.
settings.text_answer4: Good news! We offer free shipping to our valued customers. Regardless of the weight of your package, its destination, or the shipping method you choose, you won't have to worry about any additional shipping costs. Enjoy the convenience of having your pet supplies delivered right to your doorstep without any extra fees.
settings.text_question5: How long will it take to receive my order?
settings.text_answer5: The delivery time depends on your location and the shipping method you choose. Typically, orders are processed within 1-2 business days. Standard shipping within the domestic United States usually takes 3-7 business days, while international shipping may take longer. You can track your order using the provided tracking number in your order confirmation email.
settings.text_answer6: Yes, we offer international shipping to select countries. During the checkout process, you will be able to see if your country is eligible for shipping. Please note that international shipping may be subject to customs fees and import taxes, which are the responsibility of the recipient.
settings.text_answer7: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you're not happy with an item, you may return it within 30 days of receiving it for a refund or exchange. The item must be unused, in its original packaging, and accompanied by a receipt or proof of purchase. Please refer to our Information page for detailed instructions on how to initiate a return.
settings.text_question8: Can I track the status of my order?
settings.text_answer8: Yes, once your order is shipped, you will receive a shipping confirmation email containing a tracking number. You can use this tracking number to monitor the progress of your delivery on our website or the shipping carrier's website.
settings.text_question9: Do you offer discounts or promotions?
settings.text_answer9: Yes, we often have special discounts and promotions available. To stay updated on our latest offers, sign up for our newsletter or follow us on social media. Additionally, keep an eye out for any ongoing sales or promotions displayed on our website.
settings.text_question10: How can I contact your customer support?
settings.text_answer10: We're here to assist you! If you have any questions, concerns, or need assistance with your order, you can reach our friendly customer support team by emailing support@pawious.com, live chat, via phone number +19013007447 or by filling out the contact form on our website. We strive to respond promptly and provide you with the help you need.

.menu > ul > li > ul.normal-sub > li a:hover,.menu > ul > li ul.normal-sub-sub > li a:hover {background-color: #f5fafd !important;}

settings.quote: This is gold! This is a very important part of the business. If your website isn’t converting your wasting money on traffic!
That being said… The Shoptimized theme is probably my favourite theme out on the market atm. Versatile, lots of customisation options and built with conversions in mind
This is bar-none the best theme I’ve seen to date. It’s fast on mobile AND desktop.
I moved to Shoptimized exactly because it’s faster than what I was on before and needs less apps that slow the whole thing down. It’s even faster than out of the sandbox retina theme.

We do 6-figures a month using Shoptimized. No complaints here. I’ve switched themes at least a dozen times but I always come back to Shoptimized because of its versatility and built-in marketing functions.

I use Shoptimized on all of my stores. I’ve tested a dozen different themes and this one converts the highest and has a lot of features built in so you don’t have to waste money on recurring app fees.

custom_css: .menu > ul > li > ul.normal-sub,.menu > ul > li > ul > li > ul.normal-sub-sub,ul.normal-sub-sub li,ul.normal-sub li {padding: 0;}
